headline: Western Digital Corporation (WDC): Among Billionaire Paul Singer’s Stock Picks with Huge Upside Potential
summary: We recently published a list of Billionaire Paul Singer’s 10 Stock Picks with Huge Upside Potential. In this article, we are going to take a look at where Western Digital Corporation (NASDAQ:WDC) stands against other stock picks with huge upside potential.
